Text:
I guess jQuery 1.6.4 did not recognize .on

Here it is with click(function()

        $(function(){
           $('#bin th').click(function(){
              $(this).parent().children().removeClass('active');
              $(this).addClass('active');
           });
        });


[**EXAMPLE**][1]


  [1]: http://jsfiddle.net/SzymonDziewonski/zE4Rb/3/

I guess jQuery 1.6.4 did not recognize .on

Here's defference between library 1.6.4 and later 

[http://jsperf.com/on-vs-delegate-jquery/3][1]

.delegate should work in 1.6.4 
later they change it for .on

Here it is with click(function()

        $(function(){
           $('#bin th').click(function(){
              $(this).parent().children().removeClass('active');
              $(this).addClass('active');
           });
        });


[**EXAMPLE**][2]


  [1]: http://jsperf.com/on-vs-delegate-jquery/3
  [2]: http://jsfiddle.net/SzymonDziewonski/zE4Rb/3/
